data.title: Great local Place
data.text: Most bars in town are filled with rowdy tourist, this is a much better vibe than that. Locals watching snowboard videos, for the win!

owner_response.author: Cori H, Owner at Velvet Lounge, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for the awesome review!  We appreciate it a ton, looking forward to seeing you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unique spot you need to check out
data.text: We had walked by Velvet every day it seems in our 5 day stay, until the last day when we decided to check it out and stop in for Happy Hour. Outside they have a few tables and it looks really small, but don't let that fool you, inside the decor and look is so cool. There is a downstairs with lots of couches and places to chill and drink and the upstairs is about the same but I seriously love the decor here. We did indeed get there for happy hour and since I had been drinking so much beer over the last few days, I had a Moscow Mule, which was top notch, the best I have had except for in Prague. They do require a credit card and an ID as a hold for the copper mugs, which if you don't plan to steel them is no problem. They also have a variety of board games you can check out and play. We had the Spanish Torta as a HH app, we weren't sure what to expect but it was like an egg bread with this amazing sauce and cheese on top, really top notch filling food for $6! The music here was also one of my big favs, a mix between 60's strong voiced women and just some really cool jazz. I really liked this place in all aspects and will be visiting many times when back in Bend.

owner_response.author: Cori H, Owner at Velvet Lounge, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello!
In a world where everyone tends to take social media platforms as a place to post negativity, I wanted to truly say thank you for the kind words.  I'm super glad you loved Velvet & we look forward to seeing you in the future!  My name is Cori, I am the owner....ask for me next time & I'd love to buy ya another Moscow Mule!  Take care-
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful venue for girl's night out!
data.text: Interesting drinks made on the premise.  They will customize your order, too.  Food is minimal but excellent.

data.title: Drink special is great!
data.text: The bartenders are really friendly and the drink special is fantastic (2 for 1).  The crowd is friendly and people were constantly coming and going - which made for a fun evening.  Go upstairs if you are going to have a cocktail!

data.title: Awesome happy hour place
data.text: The cocktails and appetizers can't be beat. I had the winter white sangria which was amazing-not too sweet, the peach and cantaloupe in it was perfect. The Moscow mule was delicious too. For small bites, we enjoyed the bacon wrapped apricots---our favorite dish of the night by far! We also got the sausage skewers which had great flavor. After we finished the two plates(and drinks) we wanted another round of everything we ordered! Definitely recommend going here!

data.title: Unexciting!
data.text: We stopped in for Happy Hour & no one else was there. I wanted to try the Blue Velvet drink with blueberries, so we stayed for 1 round. Their beer selection was limited for my husband. We sat at the bar, but the bartender insisted on taking our credit card because she was the only worker there. Seemed strange, but.....We tried a small plate of the Brie cheese appetizer, it was OK, not much to it. I would recommend going to the Old Mill District, much nicer bars & restaurants.

data.title: Stop in, but don't plan to stay!
data.text: Great bar, but way too small! They need a bigger place. I love the decor, but be ready for a young crowd.

owner_response.author: Cori H, Owner at Velvet Lounge, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi!  Thanks so much of the review...we are actually the smallest building in downtown Bend!  We love our little spot a ton. In the future, if you are looking for a bit more room, come in before 9PM or after 1AM...it's still a great vibe, but a bit less busy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Bartenders
data.text: Fun place to go for some drinks. Bar upstairs and down. I prefer the upstairs one. Bartenders are friendly. Locals and out-of-towners both go there so the mix is good.

data.title: Fun decor - small space but great palce for a drink
data.text: Velvet is kind of a young person's place, it seems the later in the evening the younger the crowd.  Don't let that deter you, we like Velvet.  It's got a really cool atmosphere in a pretty small space.  There is a bar both upstairs and down, not a lot of seating but standing among a bunch of friendly people is fun.

data.title: Girls Night Out
data.text: We gals like to have a night out every now and then so we went to Velvet after work for conversation and lite fare.. Had a great time and enjoyed the atmospher..Our server was very nice and we will be back..

data.title: TOFU SLIDERS
data.text: This place is very cool, great happy hour and mellow setting with some outside seating.  I had the tofu sliders which are always great there.

data.title: Excellent service
data.text: Went at 5pm with my husband after a show at the Tower and had a very pleasurable experience.  Too early for the crowds but nice atmosphere and drinks and the appetizers we ordered were very good.  Will return to Velvet

data.title: waist-ed space, terrible service, but they have couches.
data.text: Its a sort of quirky place, the few times I went in there I was totally discouraged , I got the feeling that if you are not part of there 'croud'' they just dont wait on you, its weird

owner_response.author: Cori H, Owner at Velvet Lounge, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Penny,
Thank you a ton for your review!  We pride ourselves on great customer service to our amazing locals & tourists alike.  Sorry that you felt discouraged.  We are open to everyone, but sometimes, especially when it is quite busy, we may not have the appropriate time to talk to all of our guests.  We would love to have you back! We are pretty mellow all nights before 9PM, if you would like to come in & sit at the bar.  Thanks again for the time & the review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: we left happy after happy drinks and bites!
data.text: This was our first Bend stop! We enjoyed happy hour drinks and bites. OMG the pulled pork tacos and duck samosas...so YUM! Our bartending and cooking ladies were so much fun, and if we weren't bar hopping we would've stuck around all night! Thanks for a fun time!

data.title: Relaxing Vibe
data.text: A nice, quiet spot to grab a beer or cocktail.  It can get very busy later at night and on weekends, but since I never go there at these times it works out great as a pleasant, tranquil place to sit and read the Source and have a brew once in a while.  Decent selection, knowledgeable staff, comfy couches (upstairs).

data.title: Best infused drinks in town!!!!
data.text: Cool vibe, amazing freshly infused drinks and a great staff, its hard to go anywhere else in Bend, in fact on my way there i go!!!!!

data.title: Lively for young twenties crowd.
data.text: Met some girl friends during an off time, and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves, had a keg of Betty, and some tasty appetizers. Appetizers were good, but smallish. We enjoyed the casual seating.  Went back another time, and it was so crowded, we turned around and left. I think the younger crowd likes this place a lot.

data.title: Infused Perfection!
data.text: I've had the luck to be able to travel the world.  Velvet, is a true must stop and have a beverage!  Their infused vodka drinks are simply awesome!  Ok, giving a 5 star is sometimes looked at as....well....not factual.  Not in this case.  The owner is a very nice lady, who cares about the organic preparation of her vodka to the point of growing her own fruits and vegetables to insure the quality of her drinks.  Service is excellent, the drink selection is over the top, and they even have a multitude of beers from which to choose from! And the food is pared appropriately. If the ambiance doesn't suck you in  immediately, the drinks will! At the end of the day, or just a simple holiday, I urge you to give them a try!

data.title: Great bar
data.text: Delicious cocktails, good beer, hard to beat atmosphere. Went there after dinner at Drakes around the corner... Highly recommend!

data.title: Unique lounge feel
data.text: Cool lounge type vibe. Awesome drink specials. First time having a bubble shot (a unique glass that incorporated the liquor and the chaser in one). That plus a beer was only $5. Bartender awesome. Would return to this place.
